alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 9:07PM AKST until February 22 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Additional snow accumulations to 2 inches expected. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Along the Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until midnight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 50 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Winds and blowing snow will taper off after midnight. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
